tasks.content: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

tasks.speaker: Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana Outlined A New Process For Managing Facebook Ads And Location
tasks.content: specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Discussions also focused on improving landing page design, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opting against pop-ups and James Taylor emphasizing prominently displayed offers for a simpler user experience. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed a workaround for downloading restricted files from Google Drive, which James Taylor supported.
tasks.full_line: Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Discussions also focused on improving landing page design, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opting against pop-ups and James Taylor emphasizing prominently displayed offers for a simpler user experience. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed a workaround for downloading restricted files from Google Drive, which James Taylor supported.

tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).
tasks.full_line: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).

tasks.content: * Website Development Progress and Document Access Brayann Dinga reported that the website is 95% complete, with the remaining work focused on the testimonial video page, which requires developing a new plugin (00:13:47). Wendy Ndikum added that the plugin development is delaying the progress (00:16:02). A problem with downloading restricted files from Google Drive was raised, and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed creating separate pages for each piece of evidence to which buttons or embeds could redirect, as a workaround to the download link issues. James Taylor supported this as an easier solution (00:17:17) (00:23:10).

tasks.content: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

tasks.content: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

tasks.content: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.
tasks.full_line: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. tasks.content: specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. tasks.full_line: Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).
tasks.full_line: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. tasks.content: * Website Development Progress and Document Access Brayann Dinga reported that the website is 95% complete, with the remaining work focused on the testimonial video page, which requires developing a new plugin (00:13:47). Wendy Ndikum added that the plugin development is delaying the progress (00:16:02). A problem with downloading restricted files from Google Drive was raised, and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed creating separate pages for each piece of evidence to which buttons or embeds could redirect, as a workaround to the download link issues. James Taylor supported this as an easier solution (00:17:17) (00:23:10).

Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. tasks.content: specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Discussions also focused on improving landing page design, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opting against pop-ups and James Taylor emphasizing prominently displayed offers for a simpler user experience. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed a workaround for downloading restricted files from Google Drive, which James Taylor supported.
tasks.full_line: Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Discussions also focused on improving landing page design, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opting against pop-ups and James Taylor emphasizing prominently displayed offers for a simpler user experience. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed a workaround for downloading restricted files from Google Drive, which James Taylor supported.

tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).
tasks.full_line: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. tasks.content: * Website Development Progress and Document Access Brayann Dinga reported that the website is 95% complete, with the remaining work focused on the testimonial video page, which requires developing a new plugin (00:13:47). Wendy Ndikum added that the plugin development is delaying the progress (00:16:02). A problem with downloading restricted files from Google Drive was raised, and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed creating separate pages for each piece of evidence to which buttons or embeds could redirect, as a workaround to the download link issues. James Taylor supported this as an easier solution (00:17:17) (00:23:10).

tasks.content: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. The main talking points of the meeting were the progress and development of the WordPress site, integration of testimonials and a booking system, and the client communication protocol for the support ticket system.

tasks.content: * Booking System Integration Brian raised another issue regarding the "Book a Call" button, which led to a non-functional Calendar.com link (00:14:26). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana clarified that all booking and calendar setups should be natively integrated into "just going viral" to maintain control and avoid external access requirements. She instructed them to create a booking page or calendar within "just going viral" and embed it, which Brian confirmed they would do (00:15:43).
tasks.full_line: * Booking System Integration Brian raised another issue regarding the "Book a Call" button, which led to a non-functional Calendar.com link (00:14:26). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana clarified that all booking and calendar setups should be natively integrated into "just going viral" to maintain control and avoid external access requirements. She instructed them to create a booking page or calendar within "just going viral" and embed it, which Brian confirmed they would do (00:15:43).

tasks.content: * Website Completion Timeline and Review Plan Brian provided an estimated completion time of Wednesday for the WordPress site, which James Taylor then pushed to end of day Tuesday for review (00:16:42). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized the importance of Brian double-checking everything before marking it as done (00:17:36). James Taylor proposed reviewing some pages on Monday that were 100% complete, and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Brian agreed, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana requesting a list of pages for review on Monday (00:18:54).

tasks.content: * Court Documents and New Page Requirements Wendy Ndikum asked for clarification on the large number of court document links, as adding them all to the site would make it bulky (00:32:09). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana stated that if Dustin wanted all documents on the site, they should be added, suggesting a format similar to a provided link where clicking an underlined word would download a file (00:33:28) (00:35:25). James Taylor agreed that downloading files was a better approach than direct links to Google Drive to avoid potential slander (00:36:42). Brian mentioned Dustin had also sent a new task to add two new pages, "scientific validation layer" and "scientific proof hub page," with vague information. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised to create a "scientific proof" page for now and await more information from Dustin once they were feeling better (00:38:02).

tasks.content: * Task Completion and Meeting Wrap-up James Taylor noticed a task, "add the new account to the systems," was marked as complete but still in "in progress" (00:40:25). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana confirmed it had been completed and needed to be moved to the correct column. James Taylor noted good progress on all tasks, with SEO, mobile app, and court documents awaiting Dustin's input (00:41:24). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana inquired about ongoing repetitive tasks, to which James Taylor confirmed various tasks were handled, and then opened the floor for final questions or clarifications before concluding the meeting (00:42:16).

tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).

tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).

tasks.content: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. The team reviewed the Trello board, prioritizing the WordPress site development, and Brian presented the progress, highlighting challenges in extracting resources from the original website due to security blocks. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. tasks.content: specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Discussions also focused on improving landing page design, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opting against pop-ups and James Taylor emphasizing prominently displayed offers for a simpler user experience. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed a workaround for downloading restricted files from Google Drive, which James Taylor supported.
tasks.full_line: Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers, which involves creating Trello cards after each call, with James Taylor confirming an Excel document for onboarding to trigger manual tasks for updating Facebook ads. Discussions also focused on improving landing page design, with Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opting against pop-ups and James Taylor emphasizing prominently displayed offers for a simpler user experience. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana also reviewed the website layout for uniformity and readability, and Brayann Dinga reported the website is 95% complete, with remaining work on the testimonial video page that requires a new plugin, as Wendy Ndikum added. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed a workaround for downloading restricted files from Google Drive, which James Taylor supported.

tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).
tasks.full_line: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).

tasks.content: * Website Development Progress and Document Access Brayann Dinga reported that the website is 95% complete, with the remaining work focused on the testimonial video page, which requires developing a new plugin (00:13:47). Wendy Ndikum added that the plugin development is delaying the progress (00:16:02). A problem with downloading restricted files from Google Drive was raised, and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana proposed creating separate pages for each piece of evidence to which buttons or embeds could redirect, as a workaround to the download link issues. James Taylor supported this as an easier solution (00:17:17) (00:23:10).

tasks.content: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).
tasks.full_line: * Facebook Ads and Location-Specific Offers Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana outlined a new process for managing Facebook ads and location-specific offers. They explained that after each call with a location, they will create a Trello card with offer details, limitations, and information needed to update ads and landing pages, as well as preferred lead reception times (00:00:00). James Taylor confirmed that an Excel document will be used for onboarding to trigger tasks for updating Facebook ads once landing pages are made or updated, though this will be done manually for now before an automation is created (00:01:03). Lancey Fem Denise Cruz was asked to update the beta centers list to include columns for landing page, calendar, and ad updates, along with basic Trello information (00:02:18).

tasks.content: * Landing Page Design and User Experience Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana discussed improvements for landing pages to better entice users. James Taylor suggested that the offer should be prominently displayed at the top of the landing page (00:03:32). Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana opted against pop-ups due to potential blocking issues and the target audience being elders, preferring all information to be on a single, basic page to simplify the user experience (00:05:51). James Taylor agreed, emphasizing that the primary goal is for the solution to be effective (00:06:52).

James Taylor and Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana emphasized completing the WordPress site by Tuesday for review, with Brian agreeing to double-check everything and provide a list of pages for Monday review. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails. sample_mentions: James Taylor welcomed Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum to the meeting and confirmed attendee presence and role assignments, noting Brian and Wendy Ndikum were working on the WordPress site. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana advised Brian to create their own version while maintaining branding, and the team discussed integration of testimonials and a booking system into the WordPress site. Criselle Anne Raelyn Mana and Wendy Ndikum also discussed the support ticket system, emphasizing the importance of CC'ing admin@justgoingviral.com on all client communications and sending acknowledgment emails.
